channel.title: Mixer on World Bank Data Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Mixer on World Bank Data Lab

item.title: Spring Data Mixer
item.description: Join us on Thursday, April 11, from 4:00 pm to 5:30 pm at the WBG Library for a Spring Data Mixer, a unique opportunity to meet and engage with data and analytics enthusiasts from across the WBG. If you’re not in DC, sign up for our Data Matchmaking. We’ll randomly pair two data-loving colleagues for a virtual coffee.
